sqls.sql:
SELECT W.BARCODE_S,W.MATERIALCODE_S,W.GRADE_WMS_S,W.CREATED_BY_S,W.CREATED_TIME_T,W.GRADE_S, (SELECT M.MATERIALDESC_S FROM at_int_sap_materials M where M.MATERIALCODE_S=W.MATERIALCODE_S) materialspec_s, (
SELECT U .USERNAME FROM CORE_USER U WHERE U .USERCODE = W.CREATED_BY_S ) created_by_name FROM AT_D_QM_WMSCOMMON_LOG W
WHERE 1 = 1 <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if barcode_s??> and BARCODE_S=:barcode_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if begin_created_time?? && end_created_time??> and CREATED_TIME_T between to_date(:begin_created_time , 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(:end_created_time , 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if grade_s??> and GRADE_S=:grade_s </#if> <#if grade_wms_s??> and GRADE_WMS_S=:grade_wms_s </#if> <#if materialcode_s??> and MATERIALCODE_S=:materialcode_s </#if> <#if materialspec_s??> and MATERIALSPEC_S=:materialspec_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FlAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if spare10_s??> and SPARE10_S=:spare10_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if spare6_s??> and SPARE6_S=:spare6_s </#if> <#if spare7_s??> and SPARE7_S=:spare7_s </#if> <#if spare8_s??> and SPARE8_S=:spare8_s </#if> <#if spare9_s??> and SPARE9_S=:spare9_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from (SELECT W.BARCODE_S,W.MATERIALCODE_S,W.GRADE_WMS_S,W.CREATED_BY_S,W.CREATED_TIME_T,W.GRADE_S, (SELECT M.MATERIALDESC_S FROM at_int_sap_materials M where M.MATERIALCODE_S=W.MATERIALCODE_S) materialspec_s, (
SELECT U .USERNAME FROM CORE_USER U WHERE U .USERCODE = W.CREATED_BY_S ) created_by_name FROM AT_D_QM_WMSCOMMON_LOG W
WHERE 1 = 1) <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if arch_flag_s??> and ARCH_FLAG_S=:arch_flag_s </#if> <#if barcode_s??> and BARCODE_S=:barcode_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if begin_created_time?? && end_created_time??> and CREATED_TIME_T between to_date(:begin_created_time , 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(:end_created_time , 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if grade_s??> and GRADE_S=:grade_s </#if> <#if grade_wms_s??> and GRADE_WMS_S=:grade_wms_s </#if> <#if materialcode_s??> and MATERIALCODE_S=:materialcode_s </#if> <#if materialspec_s??> and MATERIALSPEC_S=:materialspec_s </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FlAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if spare10_s??> and SPARE10_S=:spare10_s </#if> <#if spare1_s??> and SPARE1_S=:spare1_s </#if> <#if spare2_s??> and SPARE2_S=:spare2_s </#if> <#if spare3_s??> and SPARE3_S=:spare3_s </#if> <#if spare4_s??> and SPARE4_S=:spare4_s </#if> <#if spare5_s??> and SPARE5_S=:spare5_s </#if> <#if spare6_s??> and SPARE6_S=:spare6_s </#if> <#if spare7_s??> and SPARE7_S=:spare7_s </#if> <#if spare8_s??> and SPARE8_S=:spare8_s </#if> <#if spare9_s??> and SPARE9_S=:spare9_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if>
